000: The coalmine Zollverein tells the story about how to preserve our industrial heritage. There haven't been any major things demolished. Most of the buildings are restored and are accesible. However there are a lot of fences everywhere.
005: And off course we went into an abandoned building.
006: Few of the installations are left to nature, which is a beautifull sight.
007: The biggest part of the area is a terain for events and tourists.
